altername_name: Jordan vs Bird: One on One
name: Jordan vs. Bird
overview: Can Jordan Shoot Down Bird? Super one-on-one intense action: Larry's dead-eye outside game against Michael's explosiveness! Jordan's Slam Dunk Contest: Fly high, score higher. Five judges rule the court when Michael takes off! Bird's 3-Point Shootout: Gobble up those 3-pointers like Bird and you'll be the ultimate money ball player!
